column1: Visitation will be held in the Catherine Kasper Home Chapel Monday
column3: 2015 from 4:30 pm - 8 pm and a prayer service will be held same evening at 7 pm. Mass of Christian Burial will be held Tuesday
column5: 2015 at 11:15 am in the Catherine Kasper Home Chapel in Donaldson
column6: Indiana. Burial will follow in the Mt. Carmel Cemetery
